pages.title: Enchanting Mastery
pages.text: $(italic)The problems you used to have with enchanting your items with multiple, conflicting enchantments are behind you.$(br)As a master of magic, nothing is left to your desires.
You are now able to use the enchanter to apply enchantments to your equipment that are normally mutually exclusive.$(br2)Be aware:$(br)$(italic)Such actions will require a lot of experience$().
